name: You Are Not Alone (TheEagleDev)
description:
Hello!

This Is A Project I Have Been Working On And I Decided To Release A 5 Minute Demo To The Public. So Please Be Kind And Leave Any Feedback In The Comments.

Current Support:

Windows 10 64

MacOs Support Will Come In The Future To Intel + Apple Silicon Macs

I Have Used Thunderwire Studios Horror FPS Kit To Make This Game So Big Shoutout To Them!

Their Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiLITHNzKHZRF7SL-ZJiSMg

If You Would Also Like To Please, Join My Discord Server:

https://discord.gg/McCrHbtTQK
